Direct Known Subclasses:
AssetListBox, MessagesOutputBox, MotdBox, OdeLogBox, PaletteBox, ProjectListBox, PropertiesBox, SourceStructureBox, ViewerBox
public abstract class Box
extends FocusPanel

Abstract superclass for all boxes.

A box is a container widget. It automatically handles scrolling for embedded widgets. Boxes can be resized, minimized and restored.

Nested Class Summary
static class Box.BoxDescriptor
          Describes a box in the context of a layout.

Constructor Detail

Box

protected Box(String caption,
              int height,
              boolean minimizable,
              boolean removable,
              boolean startMinimized,
              boolean bodyPadding,
              boolean highlightCaption)
Creates a new box.

Parameters:
caption - box caption
height - box initial height in pixel
minimizable - indicates whether box can be minimized
removable - indicates whether box can be closed/removed
startMinimized - indicates whether box should always start minimized
bodyPadding - indicates whether box should have padding
highlightCaption - indicates whether caption should be highlighted until user has "seen" it (interacts with the box)

onResize

protected void onResize(int width)
Invoked upon resizing of the box by the layout. Box height will remain unmodified.

Parameters:
width - new column width for box in pixel
See Also:
